AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: Ship Girl
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description:
These creatures resemble human females with extensive cybernetic augments, but they are actually physical manifestations of warship personas. They are created by channeling the untapped psychic energies of the collective unconscious to acheive unparaleled firepower miniaturization, at a cost of giving them somewhat eclectic personalities and appearances.
Be aware that loading them down with heavy cannons and armor with lower their movement ability and amplify their prodigious appetites.
They often resemble tribal deities, colorful pop stars, or historical figures whose names they bear.
